bibl.title: Greek and Latin Documents from 'Abu Sha'ar, 1990-1991.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. AS90-8-3. Fragments of at least two Latin inscriptions, one a dedication in the name of the four emperors of 309-311, and a dedication of a military unit. - 2. Inv. AS90D-SEX [007] PB8. Greek Christian Inscription (Prayer), fourth-sixth century. - 3. P. 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS91-15-3. Christian Letter. Fifth century. - 4. O 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS90D-SEX 016 PB18. Military Roster. Early fourth century.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS91-15-3 142.4 O. 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS90D-SEX-016 PB18
BAGNALL Roger S. and Jennifer A. SHERIDAN, Greek and Latin Documents from 'Abu Sha'ar, 1990-1991.

1. Inv. AS90-8-3. Fragments of at least two Latin inscriptions, one a dedication in the name of the four emperors of 309-311, and a dedication of a military unit. - 2. Inv. AS90D-SEX [007] PB8. Greek Christian Inscription (Prayer), fourth-sixth century. - 3. P. 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS91-15-3. Christian Letter. Fifth century. - 4. O 'Abu Sha'ar Inv. AS90D-SEX 016 PB18. Military Roster. Early fourth century.
